local_intent: Raise the already-grasped white_carton vertically by 0.10 m and confirm it remains held.
assumptions: white_carton is already in the gripper prior to raising
no immediate obstacles above the object within the 0.10 m lift
coherence_with_global: Implements the MainTree step where the robot lifts the grasped white_carton by 10 cm using RaiseHeld(distance=0.10, timeout_ms=1500) and verifies continued possession.
